resources.string:
Hi, around here I'm better known as GOAT from my FPL mini-league exploits last season.


I was born in Nyeri - Kenya to Robert and Jane and was brought up by my grandma 
Android programming is in my blood and I enjoy it big time. You'll find me testing apps on Android Studio and when I am tired I play FIFA or Chess Titans 
The Big Bang interests me a lot and I'm a big fun of it as it explains the Cosmos Origin 

I love cats 

I like brown skin gals 

My ultimate destination is Nice la Belle i.e. Nice because 

Nice has the vibrancy of Italy and the charm of France 

I'm a nice guy 

You can find me on this website 

www.androidshowtime.com 

My brother is called Charles 

I work as a Care Manager at 9 West in Westlands
